title: Random freeze
author: razing32
body_snippet:
I am currently experiencing random freezes of the tool on windows 10.
The app ,  when connecting to a host ,  sometimes freezes for half a minute , apparently randomly.
This prompts a unresponsive program error from windows.
Connection type : SSH

## Expected Behavior
Connection is instant and a new tab  opens with prompt

## Current Behavior
Connection sometimes hangs whole app to the point  of windows marking it unresponsive
